subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Several of Lance Armstrong’s former teammates, including George Hincapie and Levi Leipheimer, will testify in the United States Anti-Doping Agency’s case against the retired cyclist.
snippet: Several of Lance Armstrong’s former teammates, including George Hincapie and Levi Leipheimer, will testify in the United States Anti-Doping Agency’s case against the retired cyclist.
